Container.Name: PlexAnnouncer
Container.Overview: A Discord bot that sends updates about your plex media to a Discord channel using webhooks. Please see the support thread for more details on how to set it up and configure Discord and Plex.
Container.DonateText: If you like our work, please consider supporting it

Config.Name: Webhook Port
Config.Description: The port for incoming webhooks from plex

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: The path to your configuration folder

Container.Description: A Discord bot that sends updates about your plex media to a Discord channel using webhooks. Please see the support thread for more details on how to set it up and configure Discord and Plex.
